name: When Cats Fly
description:
When Cats Fly is a game about a cat.

You lost your eyes, and without them, how will you find your wings? You go out to look for your eyes, and then, your wings.

This game was made for SCREAM JAM 2020.

CONTROLS
Left and Right Arrow Keys - Move left and right.
Down Arrow Ley - Stomp.
Space - Jump.
Z - Open and close eyes, and interact with NPCs.
